thread.title: Man United hero reveals why Zlatan Ibrahimovic is scary: Striker is like this former star
thread.title_full: Man United hero reveals why Zlatan Ibrahimovic is scary: Striker is like this former star

title: Man United hero reveals why Zlatan Ibrahimovic is scary: Striker is like this former star
text:
Man United hero reveals why Zlatan Ibrahimovic is scary: Striker is like this former star STEVE BRUCE claims the similarities between Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Eric Cantona are scary. PUBLISHED: 08:14, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 08:27, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic has been remarkable for Manchester United this season, according to Steve Bruce 
Ibrahimovic is spearheading Manchester United ’s charge back to the top under Jose Mourinho . 
The 35-year-old Swede has 24 goals already - 15 coming in the Premier League - and is the club’s most-used outfield player this season. 
Ibrahimovic joined United on a free transfer after leaving Paris Saint-Germain and, despite his huge profile, was expected to begin winding down his career. GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored Manchester United's winner against Blackburn in the FA Cup GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored his 24th goal of the season on Sunday 
But his impact has shown anything but and he has stunned United fans by becoming the club’s key player. 
His performances have helped Mourinho phase captain Wayne Rooney out of the side, with his departure expected in the summer. 
And United are still on course for glory in the FA Cup, Europa League and have a spot in next season’s Champions League in sight. 
And former United captain Bruce thinks Ibrahimovic's winning personality is reminiscent of Cantona, who inspired Sir Alex Ferguson’s side during the 90s. Hilarious quotes from Zlatan Ibrahimovic Mon, October 3, 2016
